title: Whose neighbourhood is this?
creator_credit: Richard Gebhardt and Mitchell Gebhardt Film Co
brief_description: Deals with the problem of serious crime, including interviews with victims of robbery and assault, police, and criminals. Gives advice on locks and security. The film is aimed at a general audience, and takes a “common man” approach.
